activities.name: Lookup_Dt_NoDependencies
activities.description: Executes the SP ‘sps_LookupDt’ to read and return to the ADF the last FwkRunId of the current execution.

activities.name: ForEachTransformationwithNoDependencies
activities.description: Iterates over a dataset and loop by number of rows it gets with the output from ‘Lookup_Dt_NoDependencies’ activity.

activities.name: DtMethod
activities.description: Validates the value of the ‘DtMethod’ parameter

activities.name: Execute PL_11 DataTransformation_Dataflow
activities.description:
Invokes the ‘PL_11 DataTransformation_Dataflow’ pipeline and send the parameters returned by ‘FileTransformationName’, ‘TransformationPathGranularity’, ‘FunctionName’, ‘OutputUpdateDate’, ‘DtOutputId’, 
‘DtConfigId’, ‘EntRunId’, and ‘DtRunId’.

activities.name: DT_Notebook
activities.description: Execute a notebook according every transformation

activities.name: spu_DtDsOutputUpdate
activities.description: Update table DtDsOutput with an SP 'spu_DtDsOutputUpdate'

activities.name: Lookup_Dt_DataSet_Output
activities.description: Executes the SP ‘sps_ Lookup_Dt_DataSet_Output’ to read and returned to the ADF the last EntRunId of the current execution.

activities.name: sp_FillDtUpdateSuccess
activities.description: Update log table just for the transformation that were performed with successful status

activities.name: sp_UpdateDtLogFail
activities.description: Update log table just for the transformation that were performed with fail status.

activities.name: If Null Status-Failed Transformations
activities.description: Check transformation output files that previously fail (DtLogId NOT NULL) with status of NULL

ifTrueActivities.name: PL11_2_DataTransformation_CheckOutputFiles
ifTrueActivities.description:
Invokes the ‘PL11_2_DataTransformation_CheckOutputFiles’ pipeline and send the parameters returned by ‘FileTransformationName’, ‘TransformationPathGranularity’, ‘FunctionName’, ‘OutputUpdateDate’, ‘DtOutputId’, 
‘DtConfigId’, ‘EntRunId’, and ‘DtRunId’.

activities.name: LookupFailedStatus
activities.description: Search for previous transformations with NULL status that their output files were not found in previous IF condition

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT 1
FROM [dbo].[DtLog]
WHERE DtLogId IN (@{replace(coalesce(item().DtLogId,'NULL'),';',',')})
AND (DtStatus IS NULL OR DtStatus IN('Failed','Conditions not met'))

activities.name: ForEachTransformationWithDependencies
activities.description: Evaluates the NULL status in DtLogID and go in the case that matches.

activities.name: DtMethod_Dependency
activities.description:
To perform the transformation:
First check the conditions of the dependency are successfully (The lookup Dt_DataSet_Output_Dependencies not empty)
Then check for the transformations that are still with: failed status, conditions not met or null  or new transformations (NULL in their LOG information

activities.name: If Null Status-Failed Transformations_Dependencies
activities.description: Check transformation output files that previously fail (DtLogId NOT NULL) with status of NULL

activities.name: LookupFailedStatus_Dependencies
activities.description: Search for previous transformations with NULL status that their output files were not found in previous IF condition

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT 1
FROM [dbo].[DtLog]
WHERE DtLogId IN (@{replace(coalesce(item().DtLogId,'NULL'),';',',')})
AND (DtStatus IS NULL OR DtStatus IN('Failed','Conditions not met'))

activities.name: Lookup_Dt_Dependencies
activities.description: Executes the SP ‘sps_ Lookup_Dt_DataSet_Output’ to read and returned to the ADF the last EntRunId of the current execution.

activities.name: Sp_DtLogInsert_Default
activities.description: Executes the SP spi_DtLogInsert_Default to insert record into DtLog table with the execution log.

activities.name: InsertIntoFwkLog
activities.description: Executes the SP spi_FwkLogInsert to insert record into FwkLog table with the execution module information by pipeline id and with null status.

activities.name: sp_UpdateExecutionLogS
activities.description: Update the status column in FwkLog table with successful status

activities.name: sp_UpdateExecutionLogF
activities.description: Update the status column in FwkLog table with failed statusl

activities.name: ForEachTransformationwithNoDependencies_SynapseSP
activities.description: Iterates over a dataset and loop by number of rows it gets with the output from ‘Lookup_Dt_NoDependencies’ activity.

activities.name: If dtMethod equals SynapseSP
activities.description: Check dtMethod equals "SynapseSP"

ifTrueActivities.name: sp_FillDtUpdateSuccess_SynapseSP
ifTrueActivities.description: Update log table just for the Synapse SP that were executed with successful status

ifTrueActivities.name: sp_UpdateDtLogFail_SynapseSP
ifTrueActivities.description: Update log table just for the Synapse SP that were executed with fail status.

ifTrueActivities.name: Execute_CustomSynapseSP
ifTrueActivities.description: Executes custom SP setup in DtConfig table.

activities.name: ForEachTransformationwithDependencies_SynapseSP
activities.description: Iterates over a dataset and loop by number of rows it gets with the output from ‘Lookup_Dt_Dependencies’ activity.

activities.name: If dtMethod equals SynapseSP_Dependencies
activities.description: Check dtMethod equals "SynapseSP"

ifTrueActivities.name: sp_FillDtUpdateSuccess_SynapseSP_Dependencies
ifTrueActivities.description: Update log table just for the Synapse SP that were executed with successful status

ifTrueActivities.name: sp_UpdateDtLogFail_SynapseSP_Dependencies
ifTrueActivities.description: Update log table just for the Synapse SP that were executed with fail status.

ifTrueActivities.name: Execute_CustomSynapseSP_Dependencies
ifTrueActivities.description: Executes custom SP setup in DtConfig table.
